45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:While a person was going along the path he found a thorny branch upon it. He pushed it to a side and Allah approved (this action) of his and (as a mark of appreciation) granted him pardon

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ إِزَالَةِ الأَذَى عَنِ الطَّرِيقِ،
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Removing A Harmful Thing From The Road
